channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Maid
channel.description:
**The Handmaiden**
**Blue Dragon Investigative**
**Objective:** Defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.
_Passives:_ **Quick and Quiet** - Your visits will be hidden from others at night.
_Day abilities:_ **Service** - Discover if the target has Royal Blood._(1 use)_
_Night abilities:_ **Spy** - Discover if the target is occupy immune or night immune._(2 uses)_ **Look after** - Discover if the target was visited by a healer or was guarded. _(3 uses)_
_Objective:Defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm._
_Info:_ If the target gained occ immunity in game, you will **not** be notified that the target has it. If target gained night immunity through healing, hiding, etc., you will **not** be notified that the target has it. If your target is occupy immune or night immune (or both), you will be notified "The target is either occupy immune or night immune". If you used "Look after" on the target, and target was attacked you will **not** be notified that the target was attacked. Being guarded means being protected by a merc, by a sellsword, by guards, by a knight, etc.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Maid
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
DasModel:

Quick and Quiet - Your visits will be hidden from others at night.

Why is this necessary?

DasModel:

Dutiful - Immune to being occupied at night and immune to target changing.

An investigative with occupy / redirect immunity. Haha your funny. This should not be in this class.

DasModel:

Schmooze -The target will be unable to vote for the day. . (3 uses)

An investigative with a social ability in that it stops votes is no way, shape, or form need to stop votes. This ability should be removed without discussion.

DasModel:

Lock room - Your target will be unable to visit and cannot be visited. (2 uses)

This is an investigative, with prevention abilities = occupy / redirect. This ability is more like offensive

DasModel:

Service - Discover if the target has Royal Blood. (2 uses)

No problem with this since it fits the investigative theme and the maid lore

DasModel:

Examine room - Look at the target’s logbook. (3 uses)

This is an investigative ability, so it matches this class. So no problem with this.

So to recap, the handmaiden is an investigative blue dragon, but has 2 offensive abilities, 3 investigative abilities (assuming hidden visits is investigative even though it is necessary), and a social ability. The problem is the class wants to maintain its type. It primarily wants to have its type’s abilities in this case being investigative. If a small 1 ability from another type is implemented it is ok, but for the class to be perfect a person primarily wants to implement investigative abilities. So to be accepted this class must be reworked.

The Maid (Unofficial Class)

Blue Dragon Investigative
Service (Day) - At the end of the day, you will learn if your target has royal blood. - 2 uses
Poke Around (Night) - Look in someone’s chambers to determine their class type. - 2 uses
Matchmake (Night) - Try to ‘hook up’ 2 players, you will be told whether they are compatible or not (see below). - Infinite Uses
Your objective is to defeat the Unseen or Cult, and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Compatibility:

  • Members of opposing Factions are not compatible
  • Members of Neutral Factions are compatible with every Neutral Faction that they can win with
  • Royals are not compatible with each other that would be weird
  • The King and Fool are not compatible with anyone
  • The Mercenary is compatible with her target no matter the faction

Converts into The Handmaiden (Unofficial Class) or The Seeker
Cult points: 2

This is the forum of lies, version of maid an investigative. As Captain, said your class is similar, but it still has its differences.

But as you see here, this class is an investigative with only Investigative abilities thus maintaining the class type investigative.
